parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The instance ID.

>  You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) operation to query the information about all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances within a region, including instance IDs.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the access credential.

parameters.name: Password
parameters.description: The password of the database account that is used to access the instance.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance.

parameters.name: SecretName
parameters.description: The name of the access credential. The name must be 1 to 16 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, and underscores (\_). If you leave this parameter empty, the value of the Username parameter is used.

parameters.name: TestConnection
parameters.description: Specifies whether to check the connectivity to the instance by using the name and password of the database account.

parameters.name: Username
parameters.description: The name of the database account that is used to access the instance.

parameters.name: WorkspaceId
parameters.description: The ID of the workspace that consists of multiple AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances. You must specify one of the WorkspaceId and DBInstanceId parameters. If you specify both parameters, the WorkspaceId parameter takes precedence.
